original_text:
Barbarian Fury
Dirigetevi verso il Medioevo, dove l’uomo combatte tutto ciò che la natura può lanciargli contro nella fessura della Furia Barbarica. Questo gioco volatile è stato creato da Nolimit City e combina un design impressionante con un gameplay potenzialmente esplosivo.
Le gomitate sono al centro dell’azione in Barbarian Fury. Se una qualsiasi parte delle terre selvagge, si spinge verso l’alto o verso il basso per riempire tutto il mulinello. Ogni gomitata porta con sé anche un moltiplicatore che può mandare i payouts a razzo fino a 4x. Ci sono anche respins con simboli impilati e una funzione di rotazioni libere dove i moltiplicatori in espansione possono davvero far gareggiare le monete.  Questa epica avventura vi lascerà in preda alla rabbia? Diamo un’occhiata alla nostra dettagliata recensione di Barbarian Fury.
Una grafica medievale
Barbarian Fury è uno slot online di Nolimit City, che arriva poco dopo l’uscita di Punk Rocker. Si tratta di due temi molto diversi con un aspetto completamente diverso e dobbiamo riconoscerglielo – Nolimit City ha fatto un lavoro fantastico nel rilasciare due giochi totalmente unici, così vicini l’uno all’altro.
La squadra di Nolimit City si sta facendo un nome quando si tratta di slot online ricche di funzionalità. Anche se le caratteristiche del bonus Barbarian Fury sono meno numerose rispetto ad altri titoli, non sono meno divertenti con le xNudge wild e le Fury Spins incluse nel gioco.
Il gioco si svolge in una foresta innevata, mentre un gruppo di barbari si fa strada nella tundra. I simboli raffigurano i feroci barbari e le feroci creature della foresta, mentre i simboli di valore inferiore sono scudi di materiali diversi.
Ambientato nel profondo deserto, la fessura della Furia Barbarica è tutta incentrata sulla caratteristica di moltiplicatore Wild e sulla meccanica di spinta. Raffigurando lupi che ululano, orsi selvatici ruggenti e barbari selvaggi, vi divertirete un sacco a spingere i simboli su e giù per i mulinelli per ottenere enormi vittorie.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Il grande orso bruno è il Wild del gioco. Svolge tutte le solite funzioni di sostituzione e sostituisce tutti i simboli standard quando fa parte di una combinazione vincente. Finora tutto normale. Ciò che rende questo Wild un po’ diverso è che spinge su o giù per girare l’intero mulinello Wild ogni volta che fa la sua comparsa – questo è conosciuto come la caratteristica xNudge Roaring Wild.
Ogni gomitata si aggiunge anche a un moltiplicatore. Per esempio, se si atterra l’orso nella posizione più alta su un mulinello, esso spinge verso il basso altre 3 posizioni fino a riempire l’intero mulinello. Ognuna di queste 3 spinte verso il basso porterebbe il moltiplicatore da 2x, a 3x a 4x.
Se il Wild riempie 3 parti di un mulinello, si spingeva verso il basso per riempire la 4a posizione.  Questa singola spinta darebbe una spinta di 2x. E’ possibile far atterrare i wild nudging su più di 1 bobina sulla stessa rotazione. Se ciò accade, il valore dei moltiplicatori viene sommato per dare una spinta potenzialmente massiccia.
Le gomitate sono anche un elemento chiave della seconda caratteristica che vedremo, la funzione Barbarian Respin. I 3 caratteri Barbaro sono i simboli standard più gratificanti. Atterra 3 o più dello stesso Barbaro sullo stesso spin e potresti innescare questo mini bonus.
I simboli barbaro corrispondenti si espandono per riempire l’intera bobina. Poi si bloccano in posizione e segue un respin. Con 3 simboli impilati bloccati in posizione, è possibile atterrare alcuni grandi risultati se il respin cade bene. I respin Barbaro possono innescare nel gioco di base e la funzione Fury Spins che vedremo in seguito.
La funzione Fury Spins si attiva facendo atterrare 3 o più simboli di scatter in qualsiasi punto dei rulli sullo stesso spin. Il numero di giri gratuiti che riceverete è determinato anche attraverso le gomitate. Ogni posizione in cui lo scatter deve spingere verso il basso fino a quando non cade dal fondo delle bobine dà 1 giro libero.
Atterra 3 o più dello stesso simbolo barbaro e avrai la garanzia di innescare la funzione Barbarian Respin. Anche i fudge wilds sono in gioco durante i Fury Spins. Proprio come nel gioco di base, ogni gomitata aumenta il moltiplicatore di 1x. Questo moltiplicatore non si azzera però nel giro successivo. Rimane in gioco. Ulteriori gomitate possono portare il moltiplicatore sempre più in alto. Questo può portare a 8.785 x vittorie di puntata su ogni giro libero.
Altre Slot Machine simili
Ci è piaciuto Barbarian Fury. Il design del fumetto e il punteggio di spazzare si combinano bene e le caratteristiche offrono un potenziale. Se vi piace il tema della fantasia, vale la pena fare un giro. Per un’azione a tema più simile, vale la pena giocare allo slot Game of Thrones di Microgaming.

raw_translation.response:
Barbarian Fury - A Medieval Adventure

Transport yourself to the medieval era, where man battles everything nature can throw at him in the crevice of Barbarian Fury. This volatile game was created by Nolimit City and combines impressive design with potentially explosive gameplay.

Elbows are at the center of the action in Barbarian Fury. If any part of the wildlands pushes up or down to fill the entire reel, each elbow also brings with it a multiplier that can rocket payouts up to 4x. There are also respins with stacked symbols and a free spins feature where expanding multipliers can really race the coins. Will this epic adventure leave you in a rage? Let's take a look at our detailed review of Barbarian Fury.

Medieval Graphics

Barbarian Fury is an online slot by Nolimit City, which comes shortly after the release of Punk Rocker. They are two very different themes with a completely different look, and we have to recognize - Nolimit City has done a fantastic job of releasing two totally unique games, so close to each other.

Nolimit City's team is making a name for themselves when it comes to online slots rich in features. Although the bonus features of Barbarian Fury are less numerous than other titles, they are no less entertaining with xNudge wilds and Fury Spins included in the game.

The game takes place in a snowy forest as a group of barbarians make their way through the tundra. The symbols depict fierce barbarians and fierce forest creatures, while lower-value symbols are shields of different materials.

Set in the deep desert, the Fury Barbarian slot is all about the wild multiplier feature and the push mechanic. Depicting howling wolves, roaring wild bears, and wild barbarians, you'll have a lot of fun pushing symbols up and down the reels to get huge wins.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols

The big brown bear is the game's Wild. It performs all the usual replacement functions and replaces all standard symbols when part of a winning combination. So far so normal. What makes this Wild a bit different is that it pushes up or down to spin the entire Wild reel every time it appears - this is known as the xNudge Roaring Wild feature.

Each elbow also adds to a multiplier. For example, if you land the bear in the highest position on a reel, it pushes down 3 other positions to fill the entire reel. Each of these 3 downward pushes would bring the multiplier from 2x to 3x to 4x.

If the Wild fills 3 parts of a reel, it's pushed down to fill the 4th position. This single push would give a 2x push. It's possible to land nudging wilds on more than 1 reel on the same spin. If this happens, the value of the multipliers is added up to give a potentially massive push.

Elbows are also a key element of the second feature we'll see, the Barbarian Respin function. The 3 Barbarian characters are the most rewarding standard symbols. Land 3 or more of the same Barbarian on the same spin and you could trigger this mini-bonus.

The corresponding barbarian symbols expand to fill the entire reel. Then they lock in place and a respin follows. With 3 stacked symbols locked in place, you can land some big results if the respin falls well. Barbarian respins can be triggered in the base game and the Fury Spins feature we'll see later.

The Fury Spins feature is triggered by landing 3 or more scatter symbols anywhere on the reels on the same spin. The number of free spins you receive is also determined through elbows. Each position where the scatter must push down until it falls from the bottom of the reels gives 1 free spin.

Land 3 or more of the same barbarian symbol and you're guaranteed to trigger the Barbarian Respin feature. The fudge wilds are also in play during Fury Spins. Just like in the base game, each elbow increases the multiplier by 1x. This multiplier doesn't reset in the next spin. Additional elbows can bring the multiplier higher and higher. This can lead to 8.785 x stake wins on every free spin.

Similar Slot Machines

We loved Barbarian Fury. The cartoon design and sweeping score blend well and the features offer potential. If you like the fantasy theme, it's worth taking a spin. For a more similar themed action, it's worth playing Microgaming's Game of Thrones slot.

faq.question: Who created Barbarian Fury?
faq.answer: Barbarian Fury was created by Nolimit City, a game development company.

faq.question: What is the theme of Barbarian Fury?
faq.answer: The game is set in a medieval, fantasy world where players can join fierce barbarians battling nature in a snowy forest and tundra.

faq.question: What is the Wild symbol in Barbarian Fury?
faq.answer: The big brown bear is the Wild symbol of the game. It replaces all standard symbols and pushes up or down to spin the entire Wild reel every time it appears - this is known as the xNudge Roaring Wild feature.

faq.question: What does the Barbarian Respin feature do?
faq.answer: The Barbarian Respin feature is triggered by landing 3 or more of the same Barbarian symbols on the same spin. The corresponding symbols expand to fill the entire reel, lock in place, and a respin follows. With 3 stacked symbols locked in place, players can land big results if the respin falls well. Barbarian respins can be triggered in the base game and the Fury Spins feature.

faq.question: How can the Fury Spins feature be triggered in Barbarian Fury?
faq.answer: The Fury Spins feature is triggered by landing 3 or more scatter symbols anywhere on the reels on the same spin. The number of free spins you receive is determined through elbows and each position where the scatter falls can push down until it drops from the bottom of the reels and gives one free spin.

faq.question: What is the highest multiplier you can get in Barbarian Fury?
faq.answer: Each elbow adds to a multiplier in Barbarian Fury. For example, if players land the bear in the highest position on a reel, it pushes down three other positions to fill the entire reel. Each of these three downward pushes would bring the multiplier from 2x to 3x to 4x. It's possible to land nudging wilds on more than one reel on the same spin and if this happens, the value of the multipliers is added up to give a potentially massive push. This can lead to 8.785x stake wins on every free spin and the highest multiplier in the game.

faq.question: What other games are similar to Barbarian Fury?
faq.answer: If you like the fantasy theme, then it's worth playing Microgaming's Game of Thrones slot.

faq.question: What features are included in Barbarian Fury?
faq.answer: Barbarian Fury includes the xNudge Roaring Wild feature, the Barbarian Respin feature for triggering mini bonus, and the Fury Spins feature for free spins. There are also multipliers to boost payouts and nudging wilds that can appear on multiple reels on the same spin for potentially massive wins.

Review: Barbarian Fury - A Medieval Adventure

Transport yourself to the medieval era, where man battles everything nature can throw at him in the crevice of Barbarian Fury. This volatile game was created by Nolimit City and combines impressive design with potentially explosive gameplay.

Elbows are at the center of the action in Barbarian Fury. If any part of the wildlands pushes up or down to fill the entire reel, each elbow also brings with it a multiplier that can rocket payouts up to 4x. There are also respins with stacked symbols and a free spins feature where expanding multipliers can really race the coins. Will this epic adventure leave you in a rage? Let's take a look at our detailed review of Barbarian Fury.

Medieval Graphics

Barbarian Fury is an online slot by Nolimit City, which comes shortly after the release of Punk Rocker. They are two very different themes with a completely different look, and we have to recognize - Nolimit City has done a fantastic job of releasing two totally unique games, so close to each other.

Nolimit City's team is making a name for themselves when it comes to online slots rich in features. Although the bonus features of Barbarian Fury are less numerous than other titles, they are no less entertaining with xNudge wilds and Fury Spins included in the game.

The game takes place in a snowy forest as a group of barbarians make their way through the tundra. The symbols depict fierce barbarians and fierce forest creatures, while lower-value symbols are shields of different materials.

Set in the deep desert, the Fury Barbarian slot is all about the wild multiplier feature and the push mechanic. Depicting howling wolves, roaring wild bears, and wild barbarians, you'll have a lot of fun pushing symbols up and down the reels to get huge wins.

Slot Machine Features and Symbols

The big brown bear is the game's Wild. It performs all the usual replacement functions and replaces all standard symbols when part of a winning combination. So far so normal. What makes this Wild a bit different is that it pushes up or down to spin the entire Wild reel every time it appears - this is known as the xNudge Roaring Wild feature.

Each elbow also adds to a multiplier. For example, if you land the bear in the highest position on a reel, it pushes down 3 other positions to fill the entire reel. Each of these 3 downward pushes would bring the multiplier from 2x to 3x to 4x.

If the Wild fills 3 parts of a reel, it's pushed down to fill the 4th position. This single push would give a 2x push. It's possible to land nudging wilds on more than 1 reel on the same spin. If this happens, the value of the multipliers is added up to give a potentially massive push.

Elbows are also a key element of the second feature we'll see, the Barbarian Respin function. The 3 Barbarian characters are the most rewarding standard symbols. Land 3 or more of the same Barbarian on the same spin and you could trigger this mini-bonus.

The corresponding barbarian symbols expand to fill the entire reel. Then they lock in place and a respin follows. With 3 stacked symbols locked in place, you can land some big results if the respin falls well. Barbarian respins can be triggered in the base game and the Fury Spins feature we'll see later.

The Fury Spins feature is triggered by landing 3 or more scatter symbols anywhere on the reels on the same spin. The number of free spins you receive is also determined through elbows. Each position where the scatter must push down until it falls from the bottom of the reels gives 1 free spin.

Land 3 or more of the same barbarian symbol and you're guaranteed to trigger the Barbarian Respin feature. The fudge wilds are also in play during Fury Spins. Just like in the base game, each elbow increases the multiplier by 1x. This multiplier doesn't reset in the next spin. Additional elbows can bring the multiplier higher and higher. This can lead to 8.785 x stake wins on every free spin.

Similar Slot Machines

We loved Barbarian Fury. The cartoon design and sweeping score blend well and the features offer potential. If you like the fantasy theme, it's worth taking a spin. For a more similar themed action, it's worth playing Microgaming's Game of Thrones slot.
